title: Build dep from upstream spack instance not used

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
I am using a downstream spack instance and want to make use of upstream build deps when installing `clingo@master+python` with upstream versions of `python@3.8.5` (`/naaw62b`) and `cmake@3.18.2` (`/nvinghk`).
```console
$ spack spec -Il clingo@master +python %gcc@10.2.0 ^/naaw62b ^/nvinghk
Input spec
--------------------------------
 -   clingo@master%gcc@10.2.0+python
[^]      ^cmake@3.18.2%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^openssl@1.1.1c%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +systemcerts arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]      ^python@3.8.5%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis+optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +shared arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^expat@2.2.9%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +libbsd arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]              ^libbsd@0.10.0%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  patches=7f569b9287e9e5a4236636eef32ff3428f0462ec17aea359e0ebee07649f1f16 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]              ^readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]                  ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]              ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~python arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]                  ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~pic arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]                  ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]              ^tar@1.32%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^libffi@3.3%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^libuuid@2.32.1%gcc@8.3.1 cflags="-O2 -march=core-avx2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=core-avx2" fflags="-O2 -march=core-avx2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^openssl@1.1.1c%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +systemcerts arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]          ^sqlite@3.33.0%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-centos8-zen2

Concretized
--------------------------------
 -   3jpvqkr  clingo@master%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~docs~ipo+python build_type=RelWithDebInfo arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  omiok4y      ^bison@3.6.4%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  l5ey444          ^diffutils@3.7%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  f5eijhm              ^libiconv@1.16%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
 -   ldz6wrx          ^help2man@1.47.11%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  ykvfbf4              ^gettext@0.21%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2+tar+xz arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  w5m2lxc                  ^bzip2@1.0.8%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +shared arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  52hv55d                  ^libxml2@2.9.10%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~python arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  dsly4qm                      ^xz@5.2.5%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~pic arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  rchx6la                      ^zlib@1.2.11%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +optimize+pic+shared arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  ywt6xfa                  ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  vsmdmy4                  ^tar@1.32%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
 -   my4xjaa              ^perl@5.30.3%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +cpanm+shared+threads arch=linux-centos8-zen2
 -   apznhvn                  ^berkeley-db@18.1.40%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~cxx~docs~stl patches=b231fcc4d5cff05e5c3a4814f6a5af0e9a966428dc2176540d2c05aff41de522 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  vj54wup                  ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  patches=7f569b9287e9e5a4236636eef32ff3428f0462ec17aea359e0ebee07649f1f16 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  f4qhcdv                      ^readline@8.0%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  fhxayzd          ^m4@1.4.18%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +sigsegv patches=3877ab548f88597ab2327a2230ee048d2d07ace1062efe81fc92e91b7f39cd00,fc9b61654a3ba1a8d6cd78ce087e7c96366c290bc8d2c299f09828d793b853c8 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  7bnfldy              ^libsigsegv@2.12%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  nvinghk      ^cmake@3.18.2%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~doc+ncurses+openssl+ownlibs~qt arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  ywt6xfa          ^ncurses@6.2%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" ~symlinks+termlib arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  2lwzdwy          ^openssl@1.1.1c%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +systemcerts arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  naaw62b      ^python@3.8.5%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +bz2+ctypes+dbm~debug+libxml2+lzma~nis+optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tix~tkinter~ucs4+uuid+zlib patches=0d98e93189bc278fbc37a50ed7f183bd8aaf249a8e1670a465f0db6bb4f8cf87 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  mxqtupf          ^expat@2.2.9%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +libbsd arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  o7in7yf              ^libbsd@0.10.0%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  q4pmi3d          ^libffi@3.3%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  patches=26f26c6f29a7ce9bf370ad3ab2610f99365b4bdd7b82e7c31df41a3370d685c0 arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  yyy7lz5          ^libuuid@2.32.1%gcc@8.3.1 cflags="-O2 -march=core-avx2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=core-avx2" fflags="-O2 -march=core-avx2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  2lwzdwy          ^openssl@1.1.1c%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +systemcerts arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[^]  xqnc3px          ^sqlite@3.33.0%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2" +column_metadata+fts~functions~rtree arch=linux-centos8-zen2
[+]  trmh7zl      ^re2c@1.2.1%gcc@10.2.0 cflags="-O2 -march=znver2" cxxflags="-O2 -march=znver2" fflags="-O2 -march=znver2"  arch=linux-centos8-zen2
```

As can be seen, an appropriate version of the build dependency `bison` was found in upstream, `bison@3.6.4` (`/omiok4y`). However, when installing, spack insists that it must install some "missing" dependencies of `bison`:
```console
$ spack install clingo@master +python %gcc@10.2.0 ^/naaw62b ^/nvinghk
==> Warning: Missing a source id for libuuid@2.32.1
==> Warning: Missing a source id for clingo@master
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/libiconv-1.16-f5eijhml264n3jdw5cc2l4uhvhvganpj
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/bzip2-1.0.8-w5m2lxckedunq5yd5afdz4ximjsyyl6y
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/xz-5.2.5-dsly4qmuslckhhd46vpwnppash2owrkd
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-rchx6la4w4coybgwftagexqeqwmsqlgo
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/ncurses-6.2-ywt6xfa6na4dgubpp5axuzbuq746ek7f
==> Installing berkeley-db-18.1.40-apznhvnq4ydlbjex4v6gtrkop6kepnvt
==> No binary for berkeley-db-18.1.40-apznhvnq4ydlbjex4v6gtrkop6kepnvt found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: $spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/0c/0cecb2ef0c67b166de93732769abdeba0555086d51de1090df325e18ee8da9c8.tar.gz
...
```

Explicitly specifying the `bison` dependency proceeds to installing `clingo` without issue:
```console
$ spack install clingo@master +python %gcc@10.2.0 ^/naaw62b ^/nvinghk ^/omiok4y
==> Warning: Missing a source id for libuuid@2.32.1
==> Warning: Missing a source id for clingo@master
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/libsigsegv-2.12-7bnfldysgv6nysikfrceyl4jvfrk7ssx
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/ncurses-6.2-ywt6xfa6na4dgubpp5axuzbuq746ek7f
[+] /usr (external openssl-1.1.1c-2lwzdwybuor727rxvmxxdlq445eyignf)
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/bzip2-1.0.8-w5m2lxckedunq5yd5afdz4ximjsyyl6y
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/libbsd-0.10.0-o7in7yfzmv44kr2fljmbzrobpv5xwikl
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/libiconv-1.16-f5eijhml264n3jdw5cc2l4uhvhvganpj
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/xz-5.2.5-dsly4qmuslckhhd46vpwnppash2owrkd
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/zlib-1.2.11-rchx6la4w4coybgwftagexqeqwmsqlgo
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/libffi-3.3-q4pmi3dufjymvyfzhfyb2m746pystgnw
[+] /usr (external libuuid-2.32.1-yyy7lz5qosso3mqepifrde6l4hx2v563)
[+] $spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/re2c-1.2.1-trmh7zliem72hhc75bi4ijdbztyifxgr
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/m4-1.4.18-fhxayzd6pc3qvswzbsuisqzvoijfwxj7
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/readline-8.0-f4qhcdvcfxpjmly5q6xlycdypzfswaw7
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/cmake-3.18.2-nvinghkj7vuxvwvpkum5sdw5dv6ijrhj
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/expat-2.2.9-mxqtupfjyxmdkqbgv64zpp5oskebhheu
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/tar-1.32-vsmdmy4gcb6hulkm3nbhpbhpoiddmysa
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/libxml2-2.9.10-52hv55d7l4geqktj75out5xdlptoywze
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/bison-3.6.4-omiok4yw4jkp3uw4d7bxefk26qgqjmhe
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/sqlite-3.33.0-xqnc3pxq6bp2oimdz7jntb33leldgf5p
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/gdbm-1.18.1-vj54wup2gd6gm4q3h7yoi2cd5njocjr7
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/gettext-0.21-ykvfbf4kxy5vctcqx4gv7v2ijdx6z2vq
[+] /cm/shared/apps/spack/cpu/opt/spack/linux-centos8-zen2/gcc-10.2.0/python-3.8.5-naaw62bifnds2nzcxoazwqbb5bok4u4r
==> Installing clingo-master-3jpvqkriwlvpexelyzpwnm7vxaj5wzkg

==> Warning: Missing a source id for clingo@master
==> Warning: Missing a source id for libuuid@2.32.1
...
```

### Information on your system

This is on SDSC Expanse, using the system software as upstream spack.
```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.1-2177-03e3a4e40d
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos8-zen2
* **Concretizer:** original
* ```

### Additional information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [ ] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
